Firstly, if you're in the mood for something a bit quirky and humorous, I'd recommend "Incident at Loch Ness" (2004). This mockumentary-style film is all about exploring the legend of the Loch Ness monster, featuring some great cameos from Werner Herzog and Ricky Jay. It's a lighthearted, entertaining watch that might just surprise you!

If you're looking for something a bit more intense and thrilling, I'd suggest "Final Destination" (2000). This cult classic is a masterclass in suspense, with a clever premise that keeps you guessing until the very end. You'll be on the edge of your seat as the characters try to cheat death!

Which one of these catches your eye?
